title: Extends the recuitment incentive and retention program for certain active members of the New York national guard until 2021
summary: Extends the recruitment incentive and retention program for certain active members of the New York national guard until 2021.
actClause: AN ACT to amend chapter 268 of the laws of 1996, amending the education law and the state finance law relating to providing a recruitment incentive and retention program for certain active members of the New York army national guard, New York air national guard, and New York naval militia, in relation to extending the effectiveness of such chapter
